snippet: A fight seems headed to New York State’s highest court, and a final ruling may not come until next year.
abstract: Case over soda wars is shaping up as landmark of New York City Mayor Michael Bloomberg's administration, but timing of legal battle suggests definitive ruling is not likely to come before  Bloomberg leaves office on Dec 31; city lawyers file papers in Manhattan intermediate appeals court and Bloomberg weighs in, saying ruling in his anti-obesity campaign by State Supreme Court Justice Milton A Tingling is 'totally wrong'.
lead_paragraph: A fight seems headed to New York State’s highest court, and a final ruling may not come until next year.

headline.seo: Soda Legal Battle May Outlast Bloomberg’s Tenure
headline.main: Legal Battle Over Limits on Sugary Drinks May Outlast Mayor’s Tenure
headline.print_headline: Legal Battle Over Limits on Sugary Drinks May Outlast Bloomberg’s Tenure
